input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Tie Bar"
Reference Product Name: "Non-Iron Dress Shirt"
Reference Product Description:
Meet your new wardrobe staple. This must have textured solid dress shirt is perfect for any occasion, keeping you looking your absolute best at work and on the weekends. Available in trim fit and standard fit. Need help finding your shirt size? Check out our Shirt Size Guide for the perfect fit.
Collar Style: Semi-spread. A popular collar style that has a wider spread between the collar points to accommodate the widest range of tie knots. Also the best collar type to dress down and wear without a tie.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Bugatchi James Solid OoohCotton Shirt'
  - Name='Joseph Abboud Men's Modern Fit Performance Knit Twill Dress Shirt'
  - Name='David Donahue Men's Royal Oxford Trim Fit Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Boss Men's Hank Kent Slim Fit Performance Stretch Dress Shirt'
  - Name='J.Crew Women's Jules Classic-Fit Cotton Poplin Shirt'
  - Name='Banana Republic Classic Fit Non Iron Button Down Shirt'
  - Name='B+T Essentials Fit Glen Plaid Dress Shirt'
  - Name='David Donahue Men's Trim-Fit Micro-Birdseye French Cuff Dress Shirt'
  - Name='JB Britches Men's Oxford Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Eton Slim Fit Herringbone Dresss Shirt'
  - Name='UNTUCKit Wrinkle-Free Durif Shirt'
  - Name='Boss Men's Hank Slim-Fit Easy-Iron Stretch Cotton Tuxedo Shirt'
  - Name='Joseph Abboud Men's Modern Fit Performance Knit Twill Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Mizzen+main Men's Leeward Solid Stretch Performance Button-up Shirt'
  - Name='Egara Men's Skinny Fit Squares Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Boss Men's Hank Kent Slim-Fit Performance Stretch Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Eton Men's Contemporary Fit Twill Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Checkered Graph Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Lands' End Men's Traditional Fit No Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Lands' End Men's Pattern No Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Open Edit Slim Fit Stretch Cotton Button-Up Shirt'
  - Name='Pronto Uomo Men's Classic Fit Houndstooth Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Kenneth Cole Men's Slim Fit Ultra Performance Stretch Micro Check Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Custom Logo Men's Long Sleeve Buttondown Shirt'
  - Name='Lands' End Men's Tall No Iron Supima Pinpoint Dress Shirt'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bugatchi James Solid OoohCotton Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a solid cotton shirt similar in purpose and fabric type, likely dress shirt style, but no mention of non-iron or fit, so slightly less directly comparable.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Joseph Abboud Men's Modern Fit Performance Knit Twill Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Modern fit dress shirt with performance knit twill fabric; similar use as dress shirt though knit twill differs from woven non-iron cotton; comparable in function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Joseph Abboud Men's Modern Fit Performance Knit Twill Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Modern fit dress shirt with performance knit twill fabric; similar use as dress shirt though knit twill differs from woven non-iron cotton; comparable in function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: David Donahue Men's Royal Oxford Trim Fit Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Trim fit Oxford dress shirt closely matches the reference product's fit, fabric type (cotton oxford weave common in dress shirts), and style; highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Boss Men's Hank Kent Slim Fit Performance Stretch Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit dress shirt with performance stretch indicating comfort and dress use; similar functional category and fit type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Women's Jules Classic-Fit Cotton Poplin Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Womenâ€™s classic-fit cotton poplin shirt is a dress shirt but differs in customer gender and likely cut silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Classic Fit Non Iron Button Down Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron button-down dress shirt with classic fit directly matches core features: non-iron treatment, fit, and dress shirt style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: B+T Essentials Fit Glen Plaid Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Dress shirt with patterned fabric and essentials fit; relevant as dress shirt but pattern and fit details less precisely matching reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: David Donahue Men's Trim-Fit Micro-Birdseye French Cuff Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Trim fit dress shirt like reference; French cuff adds dress formality, micro-birdseye fabric is a textured dress shirt material; very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JB Britches Men's Oxford Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Oxford dress shirt aligns well with non-iron dress shirt purpose and fabric; fit style unknown, so slightly less certain.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Eton Slim Fit Herringbone Dresss Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit textured fabric dress shirt highly comparable in style and function to the reference shirt, albeit no explicit non-iron mention.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: UNTUCKit Wrinkle-Free Durif Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Wrinkle-free casual to dress shirt designed to be worn untucked; shares non-iron/wrinkle features but design intent differs slightly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Boss Men's Hank Slim-Fit Easy-Iron Stretch Cotton Tuxedo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit easy-iron cotton dress shirt tailored for tuxedo use; shares stretch and easy care features but is more formal than general dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Joseph Abboud Men's Modern Fit Performance Knit Twill Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same as earlier Joseph Abboud product; modern fit performance shirt with knit twill fabric having some differences from woven non-iron shirts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Joseph Abboud Men's Modern Fit Performance Knit Twill Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same as earlier Joseph Abboud product; modern fit performance shirt with knit twill fabric having some differences from woven non-iron shirts.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Solid performance stretch button-up shirt similar in purpose; performance fabric differentiates from traditional non-iron cotton but comparable function.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Dress shirt with skinny fit and square pattern; relevant as dress shirt but pattern and fit style less aligned with reference's solid textured trim or standard fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Boss Men's Hank Kent Slim-Fit Performance Stretch Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim-fit performance stretch dress shirt comparable in fit and functional attributes to the reference shirt.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Contemporary fit twill dress shirt with similar styling and fit emphasis; twill is a common dress shirt fabric.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lands' End Men's Traditional Fit No Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Traditional fit non-iron dress shirt closely matches the reference product in purpose, fabric treatment, and fit style.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic fit dress shirt with houndstooth pattern; relevant as dress shirt but pattern and exact fabric characteristics differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Kenneth Cole Men's Slim Fit Ultra Performance Stretch Micro Check Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit performance stretch dress shirt with micro check pattern; aligns with performance features but differs in pattern and fabric details.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve button-down shirt fits the general category but no indication of non-iron, dress style, or fit specifics; less certain relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lands' End Men's Tall No Iron Supima Pinpoint Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Tall non-iron Supima cotton pinpoint dress shirt strongly aligns with the reference in fabric, treatment, and dress shirt style, enhancing relevance.
